entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
